meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to use (a tool, method, etc.); to make use of; to put to use 「あなたの辞書を使ってもいいですか」「はい、どうぞ」"Can I use your dictionary?" "Yes, here you are."

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to use (a person, animal, puppet, etc.); to employ; to handle; to manage; to manipulate アジア諸国などから出稼ぎにきた外国人をメイドとして使うのが常識のようになっている。It has become common practise to employ foreigners working abroad from Asian countries as maids.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to use (time, money, etc.); to spend; to consume お湯を全部使わないで。Don't use all the hot water.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to use (language); to speak
遣う 【つかう】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to use (a tool, method, etc.); to make use of; to put to use 「あなたの辞書を使ってもいいですか」「はい、どうぞ」"Can I use your dictionary?" "Yes, here you are."

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Transitive verb

遣う 【つかう】

sentences.translation: "Can I use your dictionary?" "Yes, here you are."
It has become common practise to employ foreigners working abroad from Asian countries as maids.
Don't use all the hot water.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to send; to forward Usually written using kana alone洗濯物を持っていくために誰かよこしてくださいますか。Could you send someone up to pick up some laundry?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to hand over (e.g. money) Usually written using kana alone誰か助けをよこしてください。Is there someone who could help me?
遣す 【よこす】
遣す: Rarely-used kanji form.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to send; to forward Usually written using kana alone洗濯物を持っていくために誰かよこしてくださいますか。Could you send someone up to pick up some laundry?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to hand over (e.g. money) Usually written using kana alone誰か助けをよこしてください。Is there someone who could help me?
遣す 【よこす】
遣す: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: Could you send someone up to pick up some laundry?
Is there someone who could help me?

meanings.meaning: 1. errand; mission; going on an errand 使いの途中道草をくうな。Don't delay on this errand.
2. messenger; bearer; errand boy; errand girl
3. familiar spirit See also 使い魔

meanings.type: Noun, used as a suffix, Noun, used as a prefix
meanings.meaning: 4. use; usage; user; trainer; tamer; handler; charmer See also 筆使い, See also 魔法使い, See also 蛇使い, oft. read づかい when used as a suffixひとことで言えば、彼はおべっか使いだ。In a word, he is a flatterer.
遣い 【つかい】
1. errand; mission; going on an errand 使いの途中道草をくうな。Don't delay on this errand.
2. messenger; bearer; errand boy; errand girl
3. familiar spirit See also 使い魔

meanings.type: Noun, used as a suffix, Noun, used as a prefix
meanings.meaning: 4. use; usage; user; trainer; tamer; handler; charmer See also 筆使い, See also 魔法使い, See also 蛇使い, oft. read づかい when used as a suffixひとことで言えば、彼はおべっか使いだ。In a word, he is a flatterer.
遣い 【つかい】

sentences.translation: In a word, he is a flatterer.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to do; to undertake; to perform; to play (a game); to study Usually written using kana alone, Colloquial, See also する彼はその少年を使いにやった。He has sent the boy on an errand.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to send; to dispatch; to despatch Usually written using kana alone

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to put; to move; to turn (one's head, glance, etc.) Usually written using kana alone俺のマイナスドライバーどこにやった！！Where've you stuck my flat-head screwdriver?!

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to give (esp. to someone of equal or lower status); to let have; to present; to bestow; to confer Usually written using kana alone５ドルをやる。Here's $5.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to make (a vehicle) go faster Usually written using kana alone

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to run (a business); to keep; to be engaged in; to practice (law, medicine, etc.); to practise Usually written using kana alone全てを捨ててこのレストランをやる目的はひとつだけでした。I had only one aim in throwing everything away to run this restaurant.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to have (food, drink, etc.); to eat; to drink; to smoke Usually written using kana alone

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to hold (a performance); to perform; to show Usually written using kana alone, See also 演る

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to ease (one's mind) Usually written using kana alone

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to harm; to injure; to kill Colloquial, Usually written using kana alone, See also 殺る無関係の人を殺るな！Don't kill off bystanders!

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to have sex; to fuck; to bang Usually written using kana alone, Slang, Vulgar expression or word, oft. written as ヤる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to live; to get by; to get along Usually written using kana alone, See also やって行く, See also やって来る
13. to do ... completely Usually written using kana alone, after the -masu stem of a verb, often in the negative
14. to do ... broadly; to do ... to a great distance Usually written using kana alone, after the -masu stem of a verb

meanings.type: Auxiliary verb, Godan verb with 'ru' ending
meanings.meaning: 15. to do ... for (someone of equal or lower status); to do ... to Usually written using kana alone, after the -te form of a verb; sometimes with negative nuance

meanings.type: Auxiliary verb, Godan verb with 'ru' ending
meanings.meaning: 16. to make active efforts to ... Usually written using kana alone, after the -te form of a verb
行る 【やる】
